<17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2
耀>{4, message}, called.<1"�>

from <17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}!<1"�>

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}?<1"�>

corps anymore!<1"�>

and plants can grow again!

fields destroyed!<1"�>

Of course, because we plant<1"�>
different corps like
bitter gourds or pepper.<1"�>

Our corps more stimulating<1"�>
then sweet and savoury!

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!?<1"�>

but nothing left...<1"�>

from me instead?

really quit...<1"�>
Want buy something?

Place ahead <17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}
called.<1"�>

monsters, <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}, in there!<1"�>

ask chief in northeast corner<1"�>
of village for permission.

Want you to defeat monsters?<1"�>

<17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}.

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!<1"�>

Very hopeful about you

No motivation for anything!<1"�>

a while.

Hmmm...

be your companion!<1"�>

Can lower enemy evasion!

to join you as a companion?

and companion!

for me, <17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2耀>{4, message}, on island!<1"�>

space in Denpa Box for me!

What!?
Not need me, <17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2耀>{4, message}!<1"�>

on your island。<1"�>

at least having one free spot<1"�>
in the"Denpa Box"

Can lower enemy evasion!<1"�>

to join you as a companion?

Oh? Are you Denpa that Kaneko
told me about?<1"�>

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} raiding our field!

Monsters come to village, eat
all crops we grow...<1"�>

but we too weak...<1"�>

to help us, please?

Have changed your mind?
Now want help<1"�>
us defeat <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}?

Me see...Don't want to force
you to help us.<1"�>
Ugh...why not want to help...

You want defeat <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}?

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} from our fields<1"�>

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!!

But <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}
normally not show up!<1"�>
Need to defeat a few
<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} first.<1"�>

and show up!<1"�>
Anyway, defeat
<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} first!

is in <17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}.<1"�>

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!<1"�>

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}。

to free rest of fields!

<17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!!<1"�>

gone. Finally can<1"�>

Thank you very much!!!

We defeated <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!
I'm gald that we were able to<1"�>

this village!

Oh, hey!
Me heard that <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}<1"�>
and <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} are defeated!

I heard! Now me not worried
that field will be attacked!

Mmh, everyone now can farm
with peace of mind again!

But we must thank not only
Denpa Men for saving village<1"�>
but also <17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2耀>{4, message} who invested in us.
Had no income but thanks to<1"�>
<17>{8, MessageNpcName, +}<2耀>{4, message} were able to afford
buying seeds!

What!?
Dad did that?

Yes, really great help! Thanks
to planting stimulating crops<1"�>
not favoured by evil creatures!

If had planted same crops as
others, <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} would<1"�>
have destroyed our field, too!

Hm! ...Accidently planted
my favourite crop!

Hohoho! You very humble!
Have planted different crops<1"�>
than everyone else for
cases of emergencies!

Me thought father was just very
stubborn with weird obsession...<1"�>
But in reality, he very clever,
not only rely on bamboo crops!

Dad, teach more about
your farming knowledge!

Wow, suddenly my son very
motivated!?<1"�>
Well, if interested, will teach
you more about farming!

Hohoho! If only more young
people interested in farming!<1"�>
Then, this village safer
and much better!

Yoyo…….<1"�>
The mushrooms of our fields
destroyed by <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}...<1"�>

into our crops, now destroyed...<1"�>
If only could eliminate
evil monsters...

us! Very courageous from you!<1"�>

other monsters besides <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!<1"�>
Be careful and do best!

What!<1"�>
You defeated <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +}!!
Wow, this we must celebrate!<1"�>
Please tell this to chief,
will be very happy to hear this!

My son not want to take over
farm in future!<1"�>
Me as mother very sad.
He not seem to have other plans<1"�>
for future! Wish, son took
example from young people here!<1"�>
Recently moved in and do
great farming!

Hello, me am Makomo.
Parents want me take over farm<1"�>
but not want be farmer!
Always brags about his crops<1"�>
being different from others and
how have not been destroyed...<1"�>
Me not can respect adult like
father, not want follow<1"�>
his footsteps in future...

Moved to village because
husband wanted do farming.<1"�>
Village chief thaught us lot of
farming. We worked hard to<1"�>
grow crops. Me thought about
having children but only<1"�>
when farming business runs
stable, will take long time...

Before, in <17>{8, MessageMapName, +}<2耀>{4, message}
male yell was heard!<1"�>
What, <17>{9, MonsterParameter, +}<2耀>{3, name, +} are gone now!
I'm so happy now!
